diagnosis: Upper Respiratory Tract Infection with post-viral fatigue

tests: Chest X-ray if cough persists beyond 2 weeks
follow_up: Schedule follow-up visit in 2 weeks if symptoms persist
Seek immediate medical attention if symptoms worsen or new symptoms develop
advice: Rest adequately and ensure 7-8 hours of sleep per night
Stay well hydrated - drink at least 8 glasses of water daily
Avoid strenuous physical activity until fatigue improves
Use humidifier at night to help with dry cough
Monitor and record any episodes of lightheadedness
